channel.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
channel.description:
[Main Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/master-rework-of-doom/47102)
Killer Reworks:
> **[color=blue]Knight (Blue Dragon Killer)[/color]** > > Passive: Armored: You have one time night immunity. > > Passive: Retribution: If you are executed, you will kill your first accuser. > > Night Ability: Sacrifice: Guard your target. If they are attacked, protect them and kill all attackers. Unlimited uses. If you have your immunity, you will lose it, otherwise you will die. > > Night Ability: Cold Steel: Attack your target. If you would kill Blue Dragon, commit suicide instead.
> **[color=blue]Duelist (Blue Dragon Killer)[/color]** > Passive 1: Competitive: Occupy and Redirect immune. > > Passive 2: Last stand: If you are the last Blue Dragon alive then you can use both night ability’s at the same time. > > Night Ability 1: Parry - If Target player tries to target you with an action then remove their immunities and make them target themselves. Every successful use of this ability gives you a use of strike. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Strike - Occupy and kill the target. This Ability will be disabled if you kill a BD. The Occupy will fail if the kill does (the kill is not dependent on the Occupy). 0 uses.
> **[color=purple]Lancer (Unseen Offensive)[/color]** > > Passive 1: Competitive - Occupy and Redirect immune. > > Passive 2: Berserk - If the Mastermind is dead then Stagger has unlimited uses and Occupies the target. > > Day Ability 1: Guard stance - Parry effects target’s visitor’s instead of yours and doesn’t inform the person that gets parried of the redirect. 3 uses. > > Day Ability 2: Grapple - Parry secretly redirects ALL visitors to the target bypassing their redirect Immunity. The targets immunities are removed so long as you have at least 1 visitor. 4 uses. > > Night ability 1: Parry - Same as Duelist. Unlimited uses. > > Night ability 2: Stagger - Disable the targets passives for 2 nights (including this one). 2 uses.
> **[color=blue]Hunter (Blue Dragon Killing)[/color]** > > Passive: Isolation: Immune to occupation and redirection. > > Day Ability: Wolf: Target player starts to bleed, and will die in two nights unless healed. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Bear: Become immune to conversions and death for the night. Kill all attackers, bypassing immunity. 3 uses.
> **[color=purple]Poacher (Unseen Offensive)[/color]** > > Passive: Isolation: Immune to occupation and redirection. > > Day Ability: Wolf: Target player starts to bleed, and will die in two nights unless healed. 1 use. > > Night Ability: Target player is prevented from visiting anyone tonight. They will be told they were prevented from visiting their target. Traps only work once per player. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability: Anyone who visits target player will be prevented. They will be told they were prevented from visiting their target. 2 uses.
> [color=red]**Acolyte (Cult Killer)**[/color] > > Day Ability: Curse: Anybody who is bleeding cannot be healed tonight. 1 use. > > Day ability : Judgement - Target player starts to bleed, and will die in two nights unless healed. 1 use. > > Night ability: Rampage - Eradicate will bypass night immunity tonight. 1 uses.

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: Vulgard
item.description:
Also Poacher’s night ability names are Spike Trap and Snare Trap respectively, it’s not written there. Also, his “Wolf” is actually named “Lure”. Unless you made that change on purpose

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
NightX:

Day ability : Judgement - Target player starts to bleed, and will die in two nights unless healed. 1 use.

Isn’t this basically just rapture? If you don’t want it too be used for hunter claims then make it an attack:

Night ability: Judgement - If the cult leader fails to convert his target then attack them instead. (3 uses)

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Yeah the more I think about it the worse giving Knight Retribution seems

It’s just too much to have a non-unique and extremely common fake-claim take out its first accuser.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
We aren’t reworking everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
you forgot enforcer

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I don’t really see why cornered rat is needed. It would only appear in edge cases, and would occasionally just pop out and screw over the evils.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
I wouldn’t argue that pulling off improbable victories should have been a core part of Hunter’s identity to begin with (or any class, for that matter); but I guess you aren’t technically wrong lol

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It’s so that the change doesn’t overcompensate.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Don’t see the point of buffing it in that situation but it’ll rarely make a difference so whatever

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: Chocolate
item.description:
Hunter/Poacher rework!
NightX:

Day Ability: Lure:

Night: Snare Trap: Target player is prevented from visiting anyone tonight. They will be told they were prevented from visiting their target. Traps only work once per player. (infinite uses)

Night: Spike Trap: Anyone who visits target player will be prevented. They will be told they were prevented from visiting their target. (2 uses)(edited)

Just the names of the abilities.

It’s okay to change if you want, but it just seems like you dropped em. Thank you very much for adding the changes, we worked hard on em.

@NuclearBurrito suggested I give this to the Hunter.(I Edited the name since Last Stand is already a thing).

Passive: Cornered Rat - If you are the last BD then wolf will kill in 1 night instead of 2

Is that good?

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Added @Chocolate Hunter rework.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Making Rampage one use.

TinyDeer:

Hunter change adding conversion immunity is a good tradeoff for losing Retribution.

This is already in the game btw

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Duelist is one of those fake claims that works for a day or 2 but breaks down long term since it isn’t that unlikely for a duelist to have not redirected much until mid-late game.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
I was thinking on how Duelist could be fakeclaimable.
You could A:
have a log with always failed parries.
Or B:
Get a succesful one with one of your unseen/cult buddies (who i assume are also fakeclaiming) then proceedto use “Strike” (maybe get an assasin 2-for1 o Eradicate) so you cat get proven
However there is a problem of “Duelist , parry me.”
just a thought.

I also tried thinking of a fakeclaim for Assassin. I thought of the Archer , which may or may not be op or up.

[quote=“3DT_CheesyKnives, post:9, topic:48394”]

[Class Suggestions] 10 Classes that should be in ToL

The Archer
Blue Dragon Killer

Poison Dart(Day) - Poison a player. -Infinite uses.1 day cooldown.

Trap of Arrows (Night)- Poison all visitors. 2 uses

Your objective is to Eliminate the Unseen, The Cult, and any Neutrals who stand against you

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
TinyDeer:

I really like the Duelist’s intra-ability relationship here.

I love making Ability’s that connect to each other. Hence why the Acolyte Judgement synergies with curse so well. Other examples that are smaller mostly more in the form of day Ability modifiers such as Power Shot on Sorcerer.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
You know what would open the claims space even more?

Removing the goddamn notifications. To be fair, this reworks isn’t about the notifications so I’m not putting it here, but still.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Actually. When you think about it competitive helps claimspace more than it hurts it. It is an excellent Possessor claim for example.

Read full topic

item.title: Killer Reworks <filler>
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Okay, I guess it’s fair that it opens up claim space, but then watch when there’s two Hunters smorcing everybody

Which actually would sound pretty fun, trading claimspace for more OP classes

ANd also, @NightX I think Competitive should be removed from Duelist to actually allow it to be claimed by scum, but Parry would still bypass occupation or redirection coming from the targeted player

Read full topic
